name: Rodenbach Foederbier
note: (This is the only keg of this beer in the US!)
description: The Rodenbach Foederbier is found only in Belgium, and this keg will be the only one of its kind in the United States. It is unfiltered and unpasteurized, and comes directly from Rodenbach's famous French Oak vats that range up to 150 years old!
